short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore shared with me section with a convenient folder tree

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of not having a good overview of the "Shared with me" folders on Google Drive? 
With this extension you can get a folder tree view of the Shared with me folders, allowing you to quickly locate and access the shared folders without leaving the current web page.

Key Features:
- Folder Tree View: Explore your Google Drive's folder structure in a clean and organized tree view, making it easy to find and open the folders you need.
- Search Functionality: Quickly locate specific folders using the search bar, which filters the folder tree as you type.
- Sync and Refresh: Stay up-to-date with the latest changes to your Google Drive by syncing the folder tree with a single click.
- Seamless Integration: The extension opens in a sleek side panel, providing a non-intrusive way to access your Google Drive without cluttering your browser window.
- Secure Authentication: Authenticate with your Google account to securely access your personal Google Drive data.
